pageContent: Objective: To examine the effects of different treatments on the health-related quality of life (HRQoL) of men with localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Dose-volume parameters of the corpora cavernosa do not correlate with erectile dysfunction after external beam radiotherapy for prostate cancer: results from a dose-escalation trial
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18164862/
